title: National Armenian Salaries Archive
about-tool: The tool allows to see general trends of salaries on Armenian IT market.
about-salaries: Salaries are after taxes in Armenian Drams.
about-reported-data: The reported data is being translated to English and reviewed to exclude spam.
about-reported-salary: If a person reported “350” salary, we make an assumption that it means 350 thousand AMD.
remove-data: You might request the data you submitted to be removed. To do it drop me an email to rafael[at]rahar[dot]net.
license: Data is licensed under Open Data Commons Attribution License (ODC-By) v1, and available for download
click-on-submit: You click on "Submit my report" button on the left;
fill-in-form: You fill-in a simple form and submit the data.
thats-it: That's it. No authentication or personal data needed.
